title: Rolls-Royce - Worldwide sales volume of automobiles 2007 to 2018
summary: In general Number of sold automobiles has rose over the Year.
Number of sold automobiles is roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2010, and lastly roughly constant from 2010 to 2012.
The line drastically increased by 2.7 times from Year 2009 to 2010.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
The highest Number of sold automobiles, of value 3575.0 was reached at Year 2012
The lowest Number of sold automobiles, of value 1002.0 was reported at Year 2009
